DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study design examine effect Selegiline Transdermal System behavioral intervention smoke cessation compare behavioral intervention alone .
DOC.criteria: Must least 18 year age Be good general health Must meet Diagnostic Statistical ManualIV ( DSMIV ) diagnostic criterion nicotine dependence Be currently smoke > 15 cigarettes/day , smoke cigarette past 5 year Subjects must motivate quite smoke If female child bear potential , agree use birth control subject Subject must able understand provide write informed consent . Exclusion Criteria : Please contact site information
